overview:
Phaedra Chrousos is the co-founder and COO of Daily Secret Inc, a VC-backed digital media company. Daily Secret introduces audiences and advertizers around the world to popular US media format, the curated email newsletter. Every day over half a million people in 11 countries receive Daily Secret’s content in their inbox. As co-founder and COO of Daily Secret, Nikos’ focus is to build a scalable business that can grow to 32 countries and 5 million members by 2015.

Prior to co-founding Daily Secret, Phaedra co-founded, led, and sold HealthLeap, a health 2.0 platform connecting patients with doctors, to MDxMedical. Prior to HealthLeap, Phaedra consulted for Fortune 100 companies via The Boston Consulting Group and for governments around the world via The World Bank Group. Phaedra holds a B.A. from Georgetown University, a MSC from The London School of Economics where she graduated with Distinction, and a MBA from Columbia University Business School where she graduated with Honors.

Phaedra sits on the board of a number of non-profits and is an active fundraiser for her alma maters The Maret School, Georgetown University, The London School of Economics, and Columbia University. Phaedra is an official mentor for Daily Secret’s Good Karma Initiative and an unofficial mentor for many budding entrepreneurs.
